Entries.companionAccepted: Well, well. Can't get enough of me, can you?$7#$b#Of course I'd be glad to join you.$h
Entries.companionAccepted_Dating: Absolutely!#$b#Let's go find a sweet spot to get to know each other better.$7
Entries.companionAccepted_Spouse: Sure!$h#$b#I'm ready when you are, baby.$6
Entries.companionRejected: Aw, I can't today.$s#$b#I have to do something.#$b#Maybe next time?$6
Entries.companionRejected_Dating: I can't today, baby. Maybe next time, alright?$s
Entries.companionRejected_Spouse: Aww, I have to do something first.$s#$b#I'll make it up to you when you come home later, darling.$6
Entries.companionRejectedNight: It's dark out there.#$b#You don't want to know what lies in the dark.$8#$b#Next time, alright, cutie?
Entries.companionRejectedNight_Dating: Tonight isn't good for me.$8#$b#I'll accompany you next time, promise.$6
Entries.companionRejectedNight_Spouse: I can't tonight, baby.#$b#Gotta go on my own little mission tonight.$6
Entries.companionDismiss: Oh, it's that time already?#$b#I was looking forward to spending more time with you, but oh well.#$b#More time for you to miss me.$6
Entries.companionDismiss_Dating: Aw! Already?$8#$b#But I want to spend more time!$7#$b#Hmph, okay. Make sure you make it up next time!$6
Entries.companionDismiss_Spouse: Oh, come on, baby! Just a little more time with you, please?$7#$b#Pretty please?$6#$b#Fine! Hmph.$8#$b#I'll see you back home alright? You better make it up to me.$8#$b#Okay, baby?$l
Entries.companionDismissAuto: Hey, cutie, I gotta bounce.#$b#I got some work to do, it was fun.$h#$b#See ya!$6
Entries.companionDismissAuto_Dating: Darling? Baby? I'm afraid I'll have to go.$6#$b#I got some more work to do! I'll see you tomorrow, okay baby?#$b#Take care! Here's a kiss.$l
Entries.companionDismissAuto_Spouse: Baby? I'm a little tired.#$b#I'll head back home, alright? I'll be waiting for you in bed.$l#$b#Maybe a little surprise for you?$7#$b#Teehee! See you later!$7
Entries.companionRecruited: So what's the plan? Any secluded spots you gonna take me?$6
Entries.companionRecruited_Dating: A date with my cutie baby!$h#$b#Come on! Let's go somewhere we can be alone!$6
Entries.companionRecruited_Spouse: So... What's the plan for today, baby?$l#$b#Take me somewhere far and secluded?$7#$b#I'm excited!$6
Entries.heal: You're hurt. Let me patch those up.
Entries.nomedkits: Wait! I gotta find my kit!
Entries.heal_Dating: Want me to kiss where it hurts? Just kidding! Let me patch that up.$7
Entries.nomedkits_Dating: Wait, baby! I'm looking for my kit!
Entries.farmerRunAway_Spouse: Baby! Don't you dare leave me alone!$8
Entries.heal_Spouse: Want me to kiss where it hurts? I'm serious!$l#$b# Just kidding! Let me patch that up.$7
Entries.nomedkits_Spouse: Just a sec, baby! I don't have enough patches yet.
Entries.companion_Farm: Your farm looks cute. Like you!$h
Entries.companion_Farm~1: Is it tiring tending to so many crops?#$b#I bet it is, huh?
Entries.companion_Farm_Rainy: Hey! I'm all drenched from the rain!$a#$b#You better let me shower up in your house!$6
Entries.companion_Farm_Snowy: It's so cold!$s#$b#Hey! Let me warm up inside your house for a while, cutie.$6#$b#I promise I'll behave.$6
Entries.companion_Farm_Spring: The blooming flowers look pretty.#$b#But I know I'm prettier, right cutie?$6
Entries.companion_Farm_Summer: I'm all sweaty! Let me shower at your home!$h
Entries.companion_Farm_Fall: Wow, the falling leaves are quite a mess.#$b#Need any help with that? Just repay me in some form or another.$6
Entries.companion_Farm_Winter: Wow, the farm looks empty during winter.$h#$b#Come on, want me to fill that empty feeling for you?$6#$b#Just kidding!$h
Entries.companionEnter_Farm: Wow, this is quite cute.#$b#But not as cute, cutie!$h
Entries.companionEnter_Farm_Night: Wow, bringing me back to your place this late?#$b#I could go with that.$6
Entries.companion_Farm_Night: So? When will you make your move?$6#$b#Just kidding!$h
Entries.companion_Farm_Dating: Okay, here's the deal.#$b#I help you with your farm work, you repay me with some naughty stuff afterward! Okay, baby?$7#$b#Kidding!$h
Entries.companion_Farm_Dating~1: I'm quite impressed with all the work you do here, baby.#$b#Makes me wanna gobble you up with how much I'm proud of you.$7
Entries.companion_Farm_Rainy_Dating: Yay! We're both drenched!$h#$b#Now let's both get into your shower, right?$7#$b#Please tell me that's what we're doing?$9
Entries.companion_Farm_Snowy_Dating: Okay, okay! I'll settle for cuddles by the fireplace with all this snow.#$b#But I won't promise I'll behave!$6
Entries.companion_Farm_Spring_Dating: What's prettier? Me or the blooming flowers?#$b#Ofcourse, it's me! Right, baby?$6#$b#I'm just messing with ya!$h
Entries.companion_Farm_Summer_Dating: I'm all sweaty now, baby.#$b#Is this all part of your plan?$6#$b#I'm impressed!$h
Entries.companion_Farm_Fall_Dating: I have to admit, the view's really pretty.#$b#I'm not talking about the farm, cutie, I'm talking about you.$l
Entries.companion_Farm_Winter_Dating: It's getting chilly.$s#$b#Can we hang out inside your house?$l#$b#Come on, baby! I just want to be alone with you.$9
Entries.companionEnter_Farm_Dating: Oh! Bringing me back to your place this early?$h#$b#I know you miss me, baby, but I thought we still got some work to do?$6#$b#Just kidding!$h
Entries.companionEnter_Farm_Night_Dating: My, oh my! We're at your place this late.$6#$b#I love these surprises!$h#$b#Come on! I'll pretend that I don't know what you're doing so it's thrilling.$7
Entries.companion_Farm_Night_Dating: I'm still waiting for your move, baby...$7#$b#Teehee.$9
Entries.companion_Farm_Spouse: The farm's looking good, baby.#$b#After your work, I want to have your full attention okay?$7#$b#I especially love it when you're still sweaty.$l
Entries.companion_Farm_Spouse~1: If you need any help, I'll try my best, baby.#$b#No promises though! I may not be used to nurturing stuff!$h
Entries.companion_Farm_Rainy_Spouse: Darling? Baby? I'm all drenched!$7#$b#What are you going to do about it?$9
Entries.companion_Farm_Snowy_Spouse: Brr! It's cold!$u#$b#Let's spend today indoors alone and bare, please?$6#$b#Come on!$6
Entries.companion_Farm_Spring_Spouse: How's the farm this season, baby?#$b#If you need any help, just tell me, alright?$h#$b#Just make sure to repay me with bed fights later, alright?$9
Entries.companion_Farm_Summer_Spouse: The heat's making me sweat so much!$s#$b#But not as much as last night. Right, darling?$7#$b#Teehee!$9
Entries.companion_Farm_Fall_Spouse: *sigh* For some reason we get triple the work during this season.$s#$b#Well, at least I got the day-off to spend it with you.$9#$b#So don't you dare waste it with something boring!$7
Entries.companion_Farm_Winter_Spouse: The farm's less busy during winters or not?#$b#I really don't know much about your work, and I'd love to learn more, darling.$9#$b#Maybe you can teach me all about it in bed later?$7#$b#You'll be the plant, I can be the soil. Tend to me later?$7#$b#I'm kidding! Okay! I'll behave!$h
Entries.companionEnter_Farm_Spouse: Home sweet home!$h#$b#I have to admit, It feels really nice to say that.$l#$b#Hey! Don't give me that look!$9
Entries.companionEnter_Farm_Night_Spouse: *Yawn* I'm a bit sleepy, baby.$s#$b#Come on! Carry me back to bed!$6#$b#Pretty please?$l#$b#Okay okay! I'll wait till you're finished then.$7
Entries.companion_Farm_Night_Spouse: I admit, there were some nights before where I stalked you at nights.#$b#Hey! Those were orders!$h#$b#It was funny though, you snore a lot, baby!$h
Entries.companion_Town_Rainy: Oh, I'm all soaking wet.$6#$b#Now we have to stroll around town? Kinky.$7
Entries.companion_Town_Night: Ah! The nightlife's always a thrill!$h
Entries.companion_Town_Night~1: What are our plans? Trespass some homes? Do some ruckus?#$b#Oh, how exciting!$h
Entries.companion_Town: So many cute faces!$h#$b#Oh, let me enjoy the view please?
Entries.companion_Town~1: Ooh, reconnaissance work today?#$b#This ought to be fun.$7
Entries.companion_Custom_Ridgeside_RidgesideVill: I have to admit, this place is really chill.$h#$b#Any village secrets you know about? Come on! Tell me!$6
A little secret? The locals here throw some valuable stuff away for no reason.#$b#It seems like this village is a bit richer than the town.$7#$b#Interesting...$6
Entries.companion_Beach: The beach huh?#$b#You know you could just tell me if you want to see me in my swimsuit anytime.$h#$b#I'm willing.$7
Entries.companion_Beach~1: Pst, a little tip, cutie.#$b#Don't litter in the waters.#$b#I can sense glaring eyes under there.#$b#Yep! The merfolk are a scary bunch!$h
Entries.companion_Custom_Ridgeside_LogCabinHotel: Hey, let's have a rough night here?$6#$b#A really, really, really rough night.$l#$b#Come on, baby...$6
Entries.companion_Custom_Ridgeside_RSVTheHike: There's something powerful here, I can feel it.$8#$b#But the Mistress has given this area to Bliss to investigate and she doesn't want anyone snooping around her work.$8#$b#Oh well, less work for me.$8
Entries.companionSuggest: Hey cutie! I'm bored, I'll follow you today instead, alright?$h.#$q -1 -1#Is it okay for me to follow you today?#$r -1 0 Yes#Yeah sure!#$r -1 0 No#I'm sorry but maybe next time
Entries.companionSuggest_Dating: Baby? Let's go on a date today! I missed you!$6.#$q -1 -1#Is it okay for me to follow you today?#$r -1 0 Yes#Yeah sure!#$r -1 0 No#I'm sorry but maybe next time
Entries.companionSuggest_Spouse: Baby? Darling? Let's hang out today? Come on! I wanna solo you today.$l.#$q -1 -1#Is it okay for me to follow you today?#$r -1 0 Yes#Yeah sure!#$r -1 0 No#I'm sorry but maybe next time
Entries.companionSuggest_Yes: Of course you'll agree, it's me after all.$7
Entries.companionSuggest_Yes_Dating: Teehee! You're the best, baby! Let's go!$h
Entries.companionSuggest_Yes_Spouse: Aww darling, you're the best! Let's go and have fun, baby!$6
